amendment.description: An amendment numbered 80 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds in this bill from being used toward the Civilian Climate Corps.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Self amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Self amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
